posts.post_title: WTB: Mordacai Brown (Chicago On Shirt) PSA 4 Thru PSA 6
posts.post_content: Looking to buy a Mordacai Brown (Chicago On Shirt) PSA 4 Thru PSA 6, any back will be considered. Let me know the back and your price with shipping. Strictly looking for PSA examples. Thanks for your consideration. CARD PURCHASED, NO LONGER NEED ONE.
